channel.title: 1st day of school on Life At The Circus
channel.description: Recent content in 1st day of school on Life At The Circus

item.title: A New Beginning
item.description:
Scott commented the other day that he feels the passage of time more noticeably at the beginning of the school year, rather than on the kids birthdays. I think he’s right.
Especially this year, when I packed up three backpacks and three lunch boxes and lined up 3 kids for pictures at the front door. We have our Kindergartener, on her very first day of school ever. Followed by our first grader.
